item.title: Home Depot leads Dow higher as Wall Street holds steady in summer lull
item.description: The S&P 500 slipped 0.2% and remains near its all-time high set last week. The Dow was up 68 points, or 0.2%, as of 9:35 a.m. ET, and the Nasdaq compo...

item.title: Exclusive: Anthony Scaramucci’s SkyBridge Capital to tokenize $300 million on Avalanche
item.description: The onetime Goldman Sachs executive and White House communications director has been a crypto booster for years.

item.title: Sergey Brin told Google’s AI workers that working 60 hours a week is the ‘sweet spot’
item.description: "I think we have all the ingredients to win this race, but we are going to have to turbocharge our efforts."

item.title: Sam Altman might be right: He’s not the only one who thinks the stock market is in ‘bubble’ territory
item.description: A company with a chatbot that often gets things wrong is somehow about to become the largest unicorn earth has ever seen. That does feel frothy.

item.title: The ‘shadow AI economy’ is booming: Workers at 90% of companies say they use chatbots, but most of them are hiding it from IT
